column4: so it SHOULD boot, but it doesn't. grub was overwritten with XP and my xp got rooted
did I understand taht correctly....you reinstalled xp after installing ubuntu?
yep, after my box got rooted, i reinstalled xp and that wiped out grub, i reinstalled grub, and nothing would help, no matter what i do
i am not sure the rootkit infected some bios or boot sectors cause it progressed really far, down to bios i am afraid
